description:
Momoka enjoys her first trip to Shibuya in a while. She stops by a decoration shop and accidentally has Miou`s gun decorated... Drawn by promises of a reward, Momoka tries on high heel shoes! After her hellish training, will she be able to master the heel? A high-quality organic crab escapes from the pot?! The clever crab beats the club members one after another.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Déco flashy - Je serai Cendrillon - Étoile filante rouge
Gaudy Decoration / Total Cinderella / The Red Shooting Star
Gotegote Deko / Zettai Cinderella / Akai Ryuusei
ゴテゴテデコ / ぜったいシンデレラ / 赤い流星
